# Typical-RESTful-Server

Example of typical and scalable RESTful API Server for Go

## Configuration

|    NAME     |  TYPE  | REQUIRED |  DEFAULT  |
|-------------|--------|----------|-----------|
| ADDRESS     | string | true     |           |
| PG_DBNAME   | string | true     |           |
| PG_USER     | string | true     |           |
| PG_PASSWORD | string | true     |           |
| PG_HOST     | string |          | localhost |
| PG_PORT     | int    |          |      5432 |
